title: What big data means for human subjects in federal research
text:
28 What big data means for human subjects in federal research 
Nextgov: New data analysis technology could help federally-funded researchers crunch more information, leading to scientific breakthroughs. But it could also potentially expose their human test subjects' personal information, a new proposal suggests.
